name: Zappollie
description:
Game developed in 48 hours for the JimJam gamejam.

Endless runner - inspired by Zappa & Ollie (my two dogs)
Zappollie = Zappa + Ollie

Ollie is dreaming that he and he's older brother Zappa were fused together and they have to run for fun, avoid veterinary needles and catch as many bones as possible before they awake.
